infos.value: Pardon my intrusion. «Fortem» has arrived.
Sterne! You came for us!
Brother! It seems the battle has been grueling.
That's because my skill with a sword is not up to par with yours. Yet...
Yet...?
Today alone I have tiptoed the edge between life and death so many times... I may have gotten a little stronger.
Only a little...? Brother, you underestimate yourself.
...Underestimate, you say?
Save your breath for more peaceful times. We shall retreat at once.
There is no need to retreat. We shall separate Muraga's head from his body!
It must be done, Father! With Sterne by our side, not even Muraga...
Conceited fools!
Hourne's main force, «Solidus», is meeting to join Muraga as we speak. There's no time to waste.
However, the preparations to hold within the castle are—
We will do no such thing.
Then why head for the castle...?
Because you have me as your hostage.
Machérie! What are you doing here!?
I think I'm valuable enough to stop Hourne's invasion. Don't you agree?
N-no! I won't allow it!
Mont, hold the rear during our retreat.
That's impossible. Mont isn't ready.
Lady Machérie... You are our prisoner, are you not?
I would like you to leave the planning to us.
Hold off the enemy here until we, the main force, are out of your periphery.
Thereafter, make for the castle while evading their pursuit. Understood?
Y-yes, Father!
And Mont... Don't die, all right?
Of course.
Brother...
Have faith. I'll see it done!
Watch over Father.
I'm sure he has some kind of plan in mind.
It'll come to light soon enough. So...
Soon enough, you say...
